function.name: CmdVelRawOutput

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function publish

input.name: lin.x
input.desc: Component on X axe of the linear velocity

input.name: lin.y
input.desc: Component on Y axe of the linear velocity

input.name: lin.z
input.desc: Component on Z axe of the linear velocity

input.name: rot.x
input.desc: Component on X axe of the rotational velocity

input.name: rot.y
input.desc: Component on Y axe of the rotational velocity

input.name: rot.z
input.desc: Component on Z axe of the rotational velocity

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational command velocity in geometry_msgs::Twist message

function.name: CmdVelVectOutput

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: lin
input.desc: Linear velocity. Must be dimension 3 [(3,1) or (3,1)]

input.name: rot
input.desc: Rotational velocity. Must be dimension 3 [(3,1) or (3,1)]

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational command velocity in geometry_msgs::Twist message

function.name: CmdVel2DOutput

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

function.desc: Publish 3D linear and rotational command velocity in geometry_msgs::Twist message. Set only lin.x and rot.z, other component is set to 0. Useful to command simple mobile base
